text: Hey, Huggy! Can I play ball with you?
No, I’m ok!
Well, you don’t seem ok.
Look, I just wanna play by myself.
OK, but first I have something to tell you.

I've got cookies in my bag
I see you like one or two

I could keep them for myself
But I’d rather share them with you!

I've got crayons in my box
I see that you need a few

I could keep them for myself
But I’d rather share it with you!

'Cause Sharing is caring
Sharing is love

Whenever we’re sharing
It feels just like a great big hug!

I like swinging on the swing
I know you'd like to swing too

So, I say, "Hey! Let's take turns!" '
Cause I’d rather share it with you!
Really?

Got a new computer game
I know you’d like to play too
Of course!
So I say, "Hey!
Let's take turns!"
'Cause I’d rather share it with you!

'Cause Sharing is caring
Sharing is love

Whenever we’re sharing
It feels just like a great big hug!

I've got friends you ought to meet
Books to read together

You’ve got moves that can’t be beat!
Sharing makes them so much better!

'Cause Sharing is caring
Sharing is love

Whenever we’re sharing
It feels just like a great big hug!

Sharing is caring
Sharing is love

Sharing is caring
Sharing is love
